title: CNICS overdose-related questions
description: CNICS overdose-related questions, an adjunct to the CNICS Modified ASSIST.

item.text: A drug overdose happens when a drug (or combination of drugs) causes trouble breathing or passing out, requiring help from another person to prevent harm or death.
Have you ever overdosed (OD'd) on drugs? [such as heroin, fentanyl or pain pills; cocaine/crack/meth; anti-anxiety meds, etc.]
A drug overdose happens when a drug (or combination of drugs) causes trouble breathing or passing out, requiring help from another person to prevent harm or death.
In the last 6 months, how many times have you overdosed (OD'd) on drugs? [such as heroin, fentanyl or pain pills; cocaine/crack/meth; anti-anxiety meds, etc.]
Do you have a supply of or prescription for Narcan?
